text: Regarding the solar rooftop subsidies, a transparent process is crucial. The current disbursement rate in Maharashtra seems slow. Applicants like Mr. Sharma from Pune, who applied on 26/01/2023, are still awaiting approvals as of 17:00 hrs, 15/09/2024. Perhaps linking subsidies to Aadhaar could expedite verification by MNRE. The Rs. 50,000 subsidy should ideally be processed within 60 days per the PM-Kusum scheme guidelines. Transparency reports published quarterly, by say, IIM Ahmedabad, would bolster public trust starting 01/01/2025.
